definition: variant of 圖像|图像[tu2 xiang4]
diagram/picture/drawing/chart/map/CL:張|张[zhang1]/to plan/to scheme/to attempt/to pursue/to seek

sentences.english: An optical method of pseudocolor equidensity encoding of photographic image is described. Frequency modulating of input image is made through!
sentences.chinese: 本文用光学方法实现了图象等密度假彩色编码。

sentences.english: In addition, the semi-quantitative analysis by VIDAS image analysis system were carried either.
sentences.chinese: 并用VIDAS图象分析系统进行半定量分析。

sentences.english: This method of judgment can acquire a good result in image recognition.
sentences.chinese: 这种判别方法，在图象识别中取得了较好效果。

sentences.english: The lack of exotic states tells against a picture of resonances as being composite.
sentences.chinese: 缺乏例外态也不支持共振态是复合的图象。

sentences.english: Thepath is capable of realizing real-time input, output and processing.
sentences.chinese: 它可以完成图象的实时输入，输出及处理。

sentences.english: In this paper, a translation invariance wavelet transform is applied to image denoise.
sentences.chinese: 文中主要研究平移不变小波变换在图象降噪中的应用。

sentences.english: The given method is a new and effective way in image processing of natural scenery imago.
sentences.chinese: 本方法是实现自然景物图象处理的一种有效的新方法。

sentences.english: The graph of a concave function is always below its tangent .
sentences.chinese: 一个凹函数的图象总在它的切线的下方。

sentences.english: This algorithm can help geometric transformation to avoid the loss of intensity of images.
sentences.chinese: 将该方法用于图象几何变换可以避免灰度的损失。

sentences.english: This Recommendation provides the guidance on the nominal amplitude of picture signals .
sentences.chinese: 本建议提出了有关图象信号的标称幅度的导则。

sentences.english: Now engaging in the domain of image processing and computer interface technology.
sentences.chinese: 现在从事图象处理和计算机接口技术方面研究。

sentences.english: In the image matching algorithm, a RANSAC homography method is proposed to improve the efficiency of coplanar feature matching.
sentences.chinese: 使图象间共面特征基元的匹配效率提高。

sentences.english: In this paper, We present an edge detection algorithm using generalized likelihood ratio.
sentences.chinese: 本文提出了一种利用广义似然比检测图象边缘的算法。

sentences.english: Add bitmap images to a menu.
sentences.chinese: 把位图图象加到菜单里。

sentences.english: In this paper, pseudocolor encoding of 2-D holographic images with a one-step rainbow holographic technique is described.
sentences.chinese: 介绍使用一步彩虹全息法进行二维图象的假彩色编码。

sentences.english: Digital Image Processing, K. R. Castlerm.

definition: axis of symmetry/central axis (in Chinese architecture)
intercept (the point at which a line crosses the x- or y-axis)
